Name: Meadow
Ingredients: 8 drop Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Camomile syrup
Make camomile tea and mix with equal parts caster sugar. Allow to cool, bottle and store in the refrigerator.
Review: "The base of my cocktail are raw ingredients supplied naturally from the meadows that surround us. These components tell a story from the farm to the glass, representing a journey from the ancient to the present."
History: German BACARDÍ Legacy 2015 winning drink by Juergen Wiese, Goldene Bar, Munich.
Nutrition: One serving of Meadow contains 148 calories
